alert.note: Alert for Blount; Jefferson; St. Clair (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 2:59PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Blount, northeastern Jefferson and St. Clair Counties through 400 PM CDT... At 259 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Springville, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Trussville, Moody, Springville, Odenville, Dallas, Center Point, Clay, Pinson, Margaret, Argo, Ashville, Riverside, Ragland, Chalkville, Grayson Valley, Branchville, Inland Lake, Neely Henry Lake, Logan Martin Lake and Highland Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for central, northeastern and east central Alabama.
